caption.p: HPLC-ABTS chromatograms of ( a) I. variegata rhizomes extract (H 2O) at 247 nm (HPLC, black) and 650 nm (ABTS, blue); ( b) I. hungarica rhizomes extract (H 2O) at 255 nm/650 nm, and ( c) I. hungarica rhizomes extract (70% EtOH) at 314 nm/650 nm. Gallic acid ( 1), mangiferin ( 2), and caffeic acid ( 3).
